LanguageData.BionicEye.label: bionic eye
LanguageData.BionicEye.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
LanguageData.BionicLeg.label: bionic leg
LanguageData.BionicLeg.description: Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
LanguageData.BionicArm.label: bionic arm
LanguageData.BionicArm.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
LanguageData.BionicSpine.label: bionic spine
LanguageData.BionicSpine.description: This light and impressing device can replace a damaged spine.
LanguageData.BionicEar.label: bionic ear
LanguageData.BionicEar.description: An advanced device that expands upon the basic functions of the ear drum.
LanguageData.PowerClaw.label: power claw
LanguageData.PowerClaw.description: Powerful hand replacement consisting of three deadly claws.
LanguageData.BionicHand.label: bionic hand
LanguageData.BionicHand.description: Allows the user to perform tasks even faster than with regular hands.
LanguageData.BionicFoot.label: bionic foot
LanguageData.BionicFoot.description: This prosthesis grants faster walking without stumbling all the time.
LanguageData.BionicFinger.label: bionic finger
LanguageData.BionicFinger.description: A replacement finger allowing for slightly faster and more precise movement.
LanguageData.BionicToe.label: bionic toe
LanguageData.BionicToe.description: A replacement toe which lets the wearer grip the ground slightly better.
LanguageData.BionicJaw.label: bionic jaw
LanguageData.BionicJaw.description: Aside from a strong set of teeth, this also comes with a voice modulator.
LanguageData.SilentJaw.label: silent jaw
LanguageData.SilentJaw.description: This version of the bionic jaw comes without a voice modulator, useful for abrasive patients.
LanguageData.PowerArm.label: power arm
LanguageData.PowerArm.description: Unparalleled strength and dexterity, and with retractable claws. This is the ultimate arm upgrade!
